<p>前几天需求评审的时候，产品说客户希望<code>输入框能够好看一点</code>。由于我们UI框架用的是<strong>Elemnt Plus</strong>，input输入框的样式也比较中规中矩，所以我们组长准备拒绝这个需求<img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/bd23120302d7444fb143feaad3f5a363~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=jEgfetSXZnB6M%2BSqC0pXg4QgH8U%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>但是，喜欢花里胡哨的我立马接下了这个需求！我自信的告诉组长，放着我来，包满意！</p>
<p>经过一番折腾，我通过 CSS 的技巧实现了一个<strong>带有渐变边框的 Input 输入框，而且当鼠标悬浮在上面时，边框颜色要更加炫酷并加深渐变效果。</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/abdd60004a5341cea00c60c9df2e212e~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=PJ67cdYtuMky4%2BngXeprp2IyuUE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>最后，领导和客户对最后的效果都非常满意~<strong>我也成功获得了老板给我画的大饼，很开心！</strong></p>
<p>下面就来分享我的实现过程和代码方案，满足类似需求的同学可以直接拿去用！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">实现思路</h2>
<p>实现渐变边框的原理其实很简单，首先实现一个渐变的背景作为底板，然后在这个底板上加上一个纯色背景就好了。</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/5314133afbbf4ef9a8eb4740f8b0d2b1~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=E9wAZRESezxXM7ZCUr0rYstIoqE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>当然，我们在实际写代码的时候，不用专门写两个div来这么做，利用css的 <code>background-clip</code> 就可以实现上面的效果。</p>
<blockquote>
<p><code>background-clip</code> <strong>属性详解</strong></p>
<p><code>background-clip</code> 是一个用于控制背景（<code>background</code>）绘制范围的 CSS 属性。它决定了背景是绘制在 <strong>内容区域</strong>、<strong>内边距区域</strong>、还是 <strong>边框区域</strong>。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-attribute">background-clip</span>: border-box | padding-box | content-box | text;
</code></pre>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">代码实现</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">背景渐变</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js" lang="js">&lt;template&gt;
 <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"input-container"</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span> <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"text"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">placeholder</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"请输入内容"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"gradient-input"</span> /&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span></span>
&lt;/template&gt;

<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">setup</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span>&gt;</span></span>

<span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span><span class="css">
<span class="hljs-comment">/* 输入框容器 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.input-container</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span>: center;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100vh</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100vw</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f4f4f9</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* 渐变边框输入框 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.gradient-input</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">400px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">40px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-number">12px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">16px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#333</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">outline</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/* 渐变边框 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid transparent;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(white, white) padding-box, 
              <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(<span class="hljs-number">45deg</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff7eb3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#65d9ff</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#c7f464</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff7eb3</span>) border-box;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-comment">/* Placeholder 样式 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.gradient-input</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::placeholder</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#aaa</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-style</span>: italic;
}

</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span>&gt;</span></span>
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/fbfe83d9eb87412192a70cf5b8c7a467~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=afh3GPw3Xwpgt%2Fa3NBAs%2F%2FzSKtg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>通过上面的css方法，我们成功实现了一个带有渐变效果边框的 Input 输入框，它的核心代码是</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(white, white) padding-box, 
            <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(<span class="hljs-number">45deg</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff7eb3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#65d9ff</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#c7f464</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff7eb3</span>) border-box;
</code></pre>
<p><code>padding-box</code>：限制背景在内容区域显示，防止覆盖输入框内容。</p>
<p><code>border-box</code>：渐变背景会显示在边框位置，形成渐变边框效果。</p>
<p>这段代码分为两层背景：</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>第一层背景</strong>：<br>
<code>linear-gradient(white, white)</code> 是一个纯白色的线性渐变，用于覆盖输入框的内容区域（<code>padding-box</code>）。</li>
<li><strong>第二层背景</strong>：<br>
<code>linear-gradient(45deg, #ff7eb3, #65d9ff, #c7f464, #ff7eb3)</code> 是一个多色的渐变，用于显示在输入框的边框位置（<code>border-box</code>）。</li>
</ol>
<p>背景叠加后，最终效果是：<strong>内层内容是白色背景，边框区域显示渐变颜色。</strong></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">Hover 效果</h3>
<p>借助上面的思路，我们在添加一些hover后css样式，通过 <code>:hover</code> 状态改变渐变的颜色和 <code>box-shadow</code> 的炫光效果：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-comment">/* Hover 状态 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.gradient-input</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:hover</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(white, white) padding-box, 
              <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(<span class="hljs-number">135deg</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff0076</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#1eaeff</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#28ffbf</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff0076</span>) border-box;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">5px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">118</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.5</span>), <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">20px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">30</span>, <span class="hljs-number">174</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.5</span>);
}
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/12f78c65d2794f2da0aab773a632791d~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=d%2BmiiKhRb9dgVsTBh7KGWohRAlE%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>过渡似乎有点生硬，没关系，加个过渡样式</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-comment">/* 渐变边框输入框 */</span>

<p>非常好看流畅~</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/dc1abec706fb4c39af5753b793715766~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5b-r5LmQ5bCx5piv5ZOI5ZOI5ZOI:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1738206745&amp;x-signature=owGxgccMKzL5JtCRzQT4B96ms%2FI%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">激活样式</h3>
<p>最后，我们再添加一个激活的Focus 状态：当用户聚焦输入框时，渐变变得更加灵动，加入额外的光晕。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-comment">/* Focus 状态 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.gradient-input</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:focus</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(white, white) padding-box, 
              <span class="hljs-built_in">linear-gradient</span>(<span class="hljs-number">45deg</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff0076</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#1eaeff</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#28ffbf</span>, <span class="hljs-number">#ff0076</span>) border-box;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">15px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">118</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.7</span>), <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">25px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">30</span>, <span class="hljs-number">174</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.7</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#000</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 聚焦时文本颜色 */</span>
}
</code></pre>
<p>现在，我们就实现了一个渐变边框的输入框，是不是非常好看？</p>

<h3 data-id="heading-7">总结</h3>
<p>通过上述方法，我们成功实现了一个带有渐变效果边框的 Input 输入框，并且在 Hover 和 Focus 状态下增强了炫彩效果。</p>
